query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT BSU ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.SEL = 'A' AND VALUE(A.BMT,'') = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MFQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.SEL = 'A' AND VALUE(A.BMT,'') <> '' OR A.SEL = 'S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CFQ ,SUM(CASE WHEN (A.SEL = 'A' AND VALUE(A.BMT,'') <> '' OR A.SEL = 'S') AND A.MON <= 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CFQ_3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN (A.SEL = 'A' AND VALUE(A.BMT,'') <> '' OR A.SEL = 'S') AND A.MON >= 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CFQ_3E ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.SEL = 'B' AND VALUE(A.SLA,'N') = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) RFQ FROM (
SELECT A.PJT, A.HNO , B.BMT , C.UMR , A.SEL, A.FSD , A.BSU, A.ARA,C.SLA ,SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN( B.BMT ,A.FSD ,'2') MON FROM ( SELECT B.MANDT, B.CS144_PJT PJT, B.CS144_HNO HNO, B.CS144_SEQ SEQ, A.CS143_SEL SEL, MAX(A.CS143_FSD) FSD, MAX(B.CS144_ARA) ARA, MAX(B.CS144_BSU) BSU FROM SAPHEE.ZCST143 A, SAPHEE.ZCST144 B WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS143_SEQ = B.CS144_SEQ AND A.CS143_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS144_BSU > '' AND SUBSTR(B.CS144_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND A.CS143_FSD BETWEEN SUBSTR(CAST(#GDATE# AS VARCHAR(8)),1,4) || '0101' AND CAST(#GDATE# AS VARCHAR(8)) GROUP BY B.MANDT, B.CS144_SEQ, B.CS144_PJT, B.CS144_HNO, A.CS143_SEL ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT, CS116_PJT, CS116_HNO, MAX(CS116_BMT) BMT, MAX(CS116_BCD) BCD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'B' AND SUBSTR(CS116_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') GROUP BY MANDT, CS116_PJT, CS116_HNO ) B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.CS116_PJT = A.PJT AND B.CS116_HNO = A.HNO AND A.FSD >= B.BCD
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,A.SEQ ,B.CS126_UMR UMR ,B.CS126_SLA SLA FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT, C.CS126_PJT PJT, C.CS126_HNO HNO, A.CS143_SEQ SEQ, A.CS143_SEL SEL, MAX(C.CS126_UMR) UMR FROM SAPHEE.ZCST143 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST144 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS143_SEQ = B.CS144_SEQ INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 C ON B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND C.CS126_PJT = B.CS144_PJT AND C.CS126_HNO = B.CS144_HNO AND C.CS126_GNO = B.CS144_GNO AND C.CS126_UMR <= A.CS143_FSD AND C.CS126_DDT = '' AND C.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND C.CS126_GND = 'D'
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS143_PST = 'A6' AND SUBSTR(B.CS144_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND A.CS143_FSD BETWEEN SUBSTR(CAST(#GDATE# AS VARCHAR(8)),1,4) || '0101' AND CAST(#GDATE# AS VARCHAR(8)) GROUP BY A.MANDT, C.CS126_PJT, C.CS126_HNO ,A.CS143_SEL,A.CS143_SEQ
) A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = B.CS126_PJT AND A.HNO = B.CS126_HNO AND A.UMR = B.CS126_UMR AND B.CS126_DDT = '' AND B.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND B.CS126_GND = 'D' ) C ON A.PJT = C.PJT AND A.HNO = C.HNO AND A.SEQ = C.SEQ
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 D ON D.MANDT = A.MANDT AND D.PJT = A.PJT AND D.HNO = A.HNO AND D.EXC = ''
UNION ALL
SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,'' BMT ,'' UMR ,'S' SEL ,'' FSD ,MAX(A.BSU ) BSU ,MAX(A.ARA ) ARA ,'' SLA ,SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN( VALUE(MAX(A.BMT_B ), MAX(A.ISD )) ,MAX(A.GDATE),'2') MON
FROM ( SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,A.GNO ,A.GDATE ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > '' THEN C.CS157_CAB ELSE A.ARA END ARA ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > '' THEN C.CS157_CHB ELSE A.BSU END BSU , (SELECT MAX(CS116_BMT) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PJT = A.PJT AND CS116_HNO = A.HNO AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'B') BMT_B ,D.CS101_ISD ISD
FROM ( SELECT CS126_PJT PJT ,CS126_HNO HNO ,CS126_GNO GNO ,MIN(CS126_USD) USD ,MIN(CS126_ADT) ADT ,MAX(CS126_UMR) UMR ,MAX(CS126_UHJ) UHJ ,CASE WHEN MIN(CS126_ADT) > MIN(CS126_USD) THEN MIN(CS126_ADT) ELSE MIN(CS126_USD) END GDATE ,MAX(CS126_ARA) ARA ,MAX(CS126_BSU) BSU ,MIN(B.CS157_IKD) IKD
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = B.CS157_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = B.CS157_HNO AND B.CS157_IKD > #GDATE# AND B.CS157_GND = 'D'
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_GKD = '1' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'Y' AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND CASE WHEN CS126_ADT > CS126_USD THEN CS126_ADT ELSE CS126_USD END BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE# ,1,4)||'0101' AND #GDATE#
GROUP BY CS126_PJT,CS126_HNO,CS126_GNO
) A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO AND B.EXC = ''
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = C.CS157_PJT AND A.HNO = C.CS157_HNO AND A.IKD = C.CS157_IKD AND C.CS157_GND = 'D'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 D ON D.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = D.CS101_PJT AND A.HNO = D.CS101_HNO AND D.CS101_PST = 'A6'
) A
GROUP BY A.PJT, A.HNO ) AS A
GROUP BY BSU
) AS B ON A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET MFQ = B.MFQ ,CFQ = B.CFQ ,CFQ_3 = B.CFQ_3 ,CFQ_3E = B.CFQ_3E ,RFQ = B.RFQ
